documents.document:
me

not much to say realy im about 5"10, blue eyes.
i live in solomon islands but go to bording school in sv.
i have travelled all ova the world and have lived in holland, bulgaria, england, paris, pakistan and the solomon islands but i am english even though i was born in germany.

100 questions

The Hundred Questions (copy and paste) 9 days ago

1. Slept naked? no

2. Taken a shower with someone? na (and being a border is sayin something)!

3. Kissed a member of the same sex? no way!

4. Drove a car? yup, took the wheel on the M25 and at ali`s party

5. Stole anything? nope me = law abiding citizen

6. Been in love? oh dear god yes i hated every minute

7. Been dumped? well......rejected, 2 or 3 dozen times

8. Stole money from a friend/family member? nooooooooo

17. Had a crush on your neighbour? yeh.....HAD, mind you

18. Ditched school to do something more fun? absolutely not, no

19. Slept in a bed with a member of the opposite sex? not yet

20. Lost a friend? Well I couldn't find Nj in ashford once...

21. Been on a plane? many a time

22. Been to an island? well what are we living on?

23. Slept in until 3? yes i have!

24. Love someone or miss someone right now? by jingo yes (not the love)

25. Laid on your back and watched cloud shapes go by? yeah actually, on brighton beach

26. Made a snow angel? In the road, 3 times

27. Played dress up? only when i was *cough* little

28. Cheated while playing a game? yup, rummie with george

29. Been lonely? yup

30. Kissed more than 4 people in one night? hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha no (damn!)

32. Felt an earthquake? no except when paratosh sat down

33. Touched a snake? no i would sceam

34. Ran a red light? hasn't everyone?

35. Been suspended from school? nope

36. Had detention? ya and not proud of it!

37. Been in a car accident? no, well nearly

38.Had a party in your house while ur parents were away? not yet

39.Used a fake id? no i look too old

40. Crawled through a window? yes to escape rehersals

41. Been lost? yes in a lift

42. Been to the opposite side of the country? I have

44. Cried yourself to sleep? nope, I can't sleep anyway

47. Done something you told yourself you wouldn't? Yes get lost in a lift

48. Laughed until something you were drinking came out your nose? oh yes! Sprite: Dead Ants,

49. Caught a snowflake on your tongue? I have indeed

50. Kissed in the rain? no usualy in the rain i am running for cover!

51. Sang in the shower? Oh yes!

52. Made love in a park? well there was that sunday!

53. Had a dream that you married someone? No, strange that

54. Glued your hand to something? my other hand

55. Got your tongue stuck to a flag pole? hmmmmmmmm

56. Ever gone to school partially naked? oh of course! I love it, the thrill of being partially naked in skool just drives me on! *sarcasm*

57. Been a cheerleader? no

58. Had more than ten boy/girl friends? no I'm not a player

59. Didn't take a shower for a week? once, first week of bording, the result was nits, uh!

60. Ever too scared to watch scary movies alone? No but I do have a sensitive mind

61. Played chicken? ................Oh THAT, no otherwise I'd be dead....

62. Been pushed into a pool with all your clothes on? hell yes!

63. Been told you're hot by a complete stranger? well I was asked for a lighter, I don't know if she was trying to lure me but I said "no"

64. Broken a bone? no yippeeee

65. Been easily amused? I am VERY easily amused, but not stupidly easily, I mean I'm not like some people who just laugh at the word "orange"

66. Laugh so hard you cry? Oh yeah, Chemistry, the gluestick! lol Shepps

67. Mooned/flashed someone? absolutely not

68. Cheated on a test? no - i wouldent dream of it

69. Forgotten someone's name? only for a split second

71. Done something dumb while drunk? i dont drink

73. Blacked out from drinking? no

74. Played a prank on someone? I'm too loyal to my friends, alistair is THE prime target of pranks though

75. Gone to a late night movie? well I've walked out of a movie at 11 pm

76. Made love to anything not human? Some of these questions are really quite tedious of course not!!

77. Failed a class? nope

78. Choked on something you're not supposed to eat? niene

79. Smoked pot? nope

80. Cheated on a girl/boyfriend? I can't, haven't, won't ever!

81. Celebrate the 4th of July? que?

82. Thrown strange objects? a laptop?

83. Felt like killing someone? Not literally

84. Thought about running away? hmmm never

86. Got a piercing? no

87. Cut your own hair? once when I was 9

89. Made a parent cry? yeah out of happiness

90. Cried over someone? Yes

91. Owned more than 5 sharpies? I'm sorry?

92. Dated someone more than once? Kind of....24 hours on each date and we didn't even "go out" we just had a long discussion over msn

93. Had/Have a dog? No dogs always try to eat me

94. Have an iPod? oh yes, a nano!

95. Smoked a cigarette? NO!! NEVER WILL, SMOKING IS.......UUUHHHHH!

96. Been in a band? na music aint my thing

97. Drank 25 sodas in a day? no way!

98. Broken a CD? and a DVD yes

99. Shot a gun? yup,

100. Wanted someone but could never have them? yes.....about 13 times!

stop photoshopping

2 days ago i came accros an acount on this of a girl from my skool in the pics she looked amazing but i know her in real life and shes enormous and not even slightly attractive so now im curious how many girls out there actualy look as good as there pics suggest or does everygirl on this have a degree in photoshop?

guys have feelings to

you hear all the time how guys are barsteds and make there girls feel like shit,
but girls you dont realise with all ur silly games ur hurting us just as much we just dont show our emotions as much to ur face when its eating us from the inside.
dont get me wrong the chase is fun when girls make games then but once one of u hav said "i love u" your fucking around with serious emotions.
so any girls reading this just note that we do feel aswell so bear that inmind b4 u start fucking with our hearts. and dont say something u dont mean.
